476a6(mdo sde): ltar bag med pa'i mun par 'og tu nub pa de dag ma mthong ba rnams ni/ sdug bsngal chen por gyur pa dang rgas pa dang 'chi ba rnams 'byung bar 'gyur
476a7(mdo sde): ro| |ji ltar lha de dag ni/ khyed rnams nyid dang mtshungs pa yin te/ phyin ci log rnams la ji lta bar zhugs nas bag med pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams
476b1(mdo sde): yin te| phyin ci log nyid la zhugs pa rnams thams cad la yongs su skyob par byed pa ni/ 'ga' yang med do/ /gang khyed rnams kyi khyad par las tshul
476b2(mdo sde): t hams cad kyis khyad par du 'phags pa rnams bag med pas brlags par gyur nas tshad dang mdog dang dbyibs dang nye bar longs spyod pa dang khang bu dang
476b3(mdo sde): 'od zer dang lha mo dang skye ba rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa de dag rnams khyed rnams kyis mngon sum du 'gyur pa yin na/ ji ltar na yongs su spyad par
476b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba yin/ ji ltar na 'khor rnams dang bcas pa yin/ phyin ci log la zhugs pa de'i tshe de dag ni/ bag med pa'i skyon gyis yin par mngon par mthong
476b5(mdo sde): ba'i phyir na/ thams cad la dus thams cad du thabs rnams thams cad kyis bag med pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /gang cung zad cig mtsho 'di 'dzin
476b6(mdo sde): pa dang bcas pa'i bag med pa'i mtsho de dag rnams ni/ dug gis zin pa rnams las kyang shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa yin no/ /gang 'ga' zhig me
476b7(mdo sde): rlung dang bcas par gyur pa de dag rnams kyi drung na bag med pa'i me kun tu rtog pa'i rlung dang bcas pa ni/ shin tu bar yang lhag pa yin no/ /gang cung zad cig
477a1(mdo sde): mun pa dus ring du 'thibs pa rnams las bag med pa'i rang bzhin gyi mun pa ni/ de dag rnams las zla med par khyad du gyur pa
477a2(mdo sde): yin te| thog ma med pa'i dus nas kun la ring du 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gang 'ga' zhig dgra bo glags gcod par byed pa rnams kyi nang nas bag med
477a3(mdo sde): pa'i dgra ni/ de dag rnams kyi drung na khyad par du 'phags pa yin te/ yul gyi grogs kyis kun nas glags gcod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gang cung zad mtshon
477a4(mdo sde): char brjod par bya ba so rnon po de dag rnams kyi nang nas bag med pa'i mtshon gyi so rnams ni/ lhag par rno ba yin te/ ngan song du log par ltung ba'i rtse
477a5(mdo sde): mo rnon po rnams yod pa'i phyir ro/ /gang 'ga' zhig sbrul dug can du gyur pa de dag rnams kyi drung nas bag med pa'i sbrul gyi drug gis sems can thams
477a6(mdo sde): cad kyi srog nges par 'phrog par byed pa'i dug chen po de ni/ khyad par du 'phags pa yin te/ byis pa'i skye bo rnams thams cad kyi sems stobs nges par
477a7(mdo sde): 'joms pa'i phyir ro/ /gang cung zad grogs po'i gzugs can grogs po ma yin pa rnams las bag med pa ni/ de dag rnams kyi nang na bla lhag pa yin te/
477b1(mdo sde): dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang kun tu 'dres pa'i phyir ro/ /gang cung zad 'ching bar gyur pa lcags sgrog gam/ shing gdos sam/ thag pa las byas pa de dag rnams
477b2(mdo sde): kyi nang nas bag med pa ni/ bla lhag pa yin te/ zhe sdang 'thug po dang kun tu 'dres pa'i phyir ro/ /gang 'ga' zhig pas bla lhag par gyur pa ni/ dgon par
477b3(mdo sde): rnam par 'khyams par gyur pa rnams la chu dag dang / shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu dang / grib ma dang / bzhon pa 'ang med pas sems can rnams thams
477b4(mdo sde): cad sdug bsngal bar byed pa po de dag rnams kyi nang nas bag med pa'i dgon pa ni/ shin tu bla lhag pa yin te/ bde ba'i chu dag dang skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi
477b5(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi ljon shing gi grib ma rnams las tha mar sems can rnams thams cad sdug bsngal bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gang 'ga' zhig rnam par slu bar
477b6(mdo sde): byed pa po'i ngo bo don med par gyur pa mthong ba rnams las 'di dag gi ji lta ba'i don ni/ 'di lta ste/ zo chun 'khor mo dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / smig rgyu rnams
477b7(mdo sde): so| |de dag rnams kyi drung na'ang bag med pa ni/ shin tu lhag pa yin te/ yul gyi nye bar longs spyod pa rnams ni/ g.yo bar gyur pa ji lta ba'i don dang bral
478a1(mdo sde): bas na zo chun 'khor mo dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / smig rgyu rnams las kyang bla lhag par stong pa yin no/ /gzhan yang cung zad
478a2(mdo sde): rab tu ltung bar byed pa gang yin pa'i yul du gyur pa rnams cung zad yod pa'i ngam grog dang / g.yang sa dang 'dra ba de dag rnams kyi drung na'ang bag med pa
478a3(mdo sde): shin tu lhag pa yin te/ ngan song du log par ltung ba rnams nges par yang nyams su myong bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar bag med pa 'dis ni/ lha rnams
478a4(mdo sde): dang / srog chags su gyur pa rnams thams cad dang / 'gro ba lngar skyes par gyur pa rnams dang / khams gsum du gtogs pa rnams kyang log par
478a5(mdo sde): ltung bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i phyir thams cad kyis thams cad kyang rab tu brtson pa thams cad kyis gnas skabs thams cad du sdug bsngal gyi
478a6(mdo sde): 'jigs pa rnams dang / bde ba 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang sdug bsngal rnams kyi rtsa ba 'di yongs su spang bar gyis dang / 'di lta ste/ bag med pa'o/ /de nas
478a7(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe na mu su lun+d+ha des tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa/ ji ltar/ bag yod pa ni dga' bar brjod/ /bag med sdug bsngal skal ldan yin/ /bag yod
478b1(mdo sde): bag med pa dag gi / 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid brjod/ /de ltar lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag dam pa'i lam ji lta ba bzhin du ston par byed pa po des lha de dag rnams
478b2(mdo sde): la rjes su 'doms par byed do/ /de la lha de dag rnams thams cad kyang yid las su rung bar byas pa dang / dbang po rnams rgyas pa dang / dbang po rnams
478b3(mdo sde): rab tu dang ba dang / yid rtse gcig tu gyur pas nyan par byed cing / mu su lun+d+ha pad+ma'i snying po la seng+ge'i khri la gnas pa de la 'di ltar yang rjod par byed de/
478b4(mdo sde): bdag cag rnams la shin tu phan par gyur pa dang mthar thug par bde ba gang yin pa de dag kyang 'dir brjod lags na/ bdag cag rnams la phan pa dang
478b5(mdo sde): bde ba rnams kyang khyed nyid kyis bka' stsal du gsol/ bdag cag rnams kyis ci bgyi ba'ang lha nyid kyi zhal snga nas bka' stsal tu gsol/ ji ltar tshig
478b6(mdo sde): 'di dag rnams brjod pa dang 'thab bral gyi bdag po des 'di skad ces brjod do/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa 'di ni/ thar pa'i spyod pa rnams
478b7(mdo sde): rig cing rtogs la mkhyen pa/ skyon rnams thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ yon tan rnams thams cad dang ldan pa/ sems can rnams thams cad kyi
479a1(mdo sde): yang gtso bor gyur pa'i sangs rgyas de la skyabs su song dang / sdug bsngal rnams thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur gyi /de ni/ bag
479a2(mdo sde): m ed pa rnams dang bral ba yin pas de la skyabs su song na gong na med pa'i 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rnams thams cad las yongs su skyob par 'gyur
479a3(mdo sde): ro| |de nas yang nges par mu su lun+d+ha'i drung nas lha de dag rnams kyis tshig 'di dag thos pa dang / thams cad nyid kyis pus mo rnams sa gzhi la btsug

479a5(mdo sde): gus pa skyes pa mgo bo kun tu btud par gyur pas rab tu phyag 'tshal te gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar byed pas kyang skyabs su song ngo / /thams
479a6(mdo sde): cad kyang sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun rnams la'ang legs par skyabs su 'gro bar byed do/ /yid shin tu rab tu dang ba dang / bag med pa rnams
479a7(mdo sde): la'ang rnam par smod par byed cing bshags par byed de/ gang dag bag med pa'i lha de dag rnams kyis bzod par mi nus pa rnams mang por mi bzad pa
479b1(mdo sde): rnam pa du ma rnams thams cad kyis shin tu sdug bsngal ba rnams mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas mu su lun+d+ha'ang lha de dag rnams kyi yid kun tu skyo par gyur pa de
479b2(mdo sde): dag rnams legs par mthong nas slar nyid kyang cho 'phrul rnam pa du ma rnams byed de/ yud tsam gcig la'ang rnam pa du mar gcig tu gyur nas brgyar 'gyur
479b3(mdo sde): ro| |stong du 'gyur ro/ /stong phrag brgyar yang 'gyur ro/ /yul tsam la'ang cha byad du ma dag tu byas pa'i dbyibs rnams su 'gyur ro/ /yud tsam gcig la
479b4(mdo sde): rnam pa du ma'i cha byad dag gis mtshungs par byas pa'i dbyibs rnams su 'gyur ro/ /yul tsam nyid la nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags nas rin po che'i
479b5(mdo sde): khang bu sna tshogs pa rnams kyis kun tu gang ba rnams na/ gzugs dang cha byad sna tshogs pa rnams 'dzin par byed par 'gyur ro/ /yud tsam la'ang chur
479b6(mdo sde): 'bying bar 'gyur ro/ /mgo bo stong du gyur nas kyang rin po che sna tshogs pa'i dbu rgyan dang dpung rgyan 'bar ba rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / nyi ma stong bas lhag
479b7(mdo sde): pa'i gzi brjid can lha'i tshogs rnams thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas nye ba'i nags rnams thams cad du legs par mthong ngo / /stong phrag brgyar gsal
480a1(mdo sde): b ar byed pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i lha rnams kyi tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas pad+ma chen po de nyid kyi steng du
480a2(mdo sde): 'byung bar byed pa dang / rang gi gzi brjid rnams kyis lam mer gyur par lha de dag rnams kyis lus shin tu blta bar dka' ba yin no/ /gzhan
480a3(mdo sde): yang mu su lun+d+ha de nyid kyis rdzu 'phrul gzhan yang byed par gyur pa ni/ lha de dag rnams nyid kyis bag med pa kun nas bsnyung bar bya ba'i don du 'di
480a4(mdo sde): lta ste| kha nas lha brgya stong kun tu 'byung bar byed do/ /kha cig ni/ khang bu'i steng du zhon nas rin po che sna tshogs pa'i 'od rnams kyis lus shin tu
480a5(mdo sde): gsal bar gyur pa rnams so/ /kha cig ni/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i cha byad 'dzin par gyur pas/ glu'i rol mo rnams nye bar len par byed pa rnams
480a6(mdo sde): lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang / cha byad dang / mchog tu lang tsho la bab pa'i lha mo rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas glu nye bar len pas mu su lun+d+ha'i kha nas byung
480a7(mdo sde): nas 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni/ rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi pad+ma gzhan dag rnams la nang du zhen nas snyan pa'i glu rnams len par byed pa dang / rtsi'ang
480b1(mdo sde): lha rdzas kyi ro dang dri dang yang dag par ldan pa dag 'thung bar byed de/ lhan cig spyod pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas lan brgya phrag rnams su dang / gal
480b2(mdo sde): te na lan stong phrag tu'ang mdzes par gyur pa dang ldan pa'i lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i mchog rnams kyis brgyan pa/ rang gi 'od kyi dpal 'bar ba dang ldan pa rnams
480b3(mdo sde): yin no| |gzhan yang lha gzhan dag rnams rnam pa gzhan gyis mu su lun+d+ha de'i kha nas kun tu byung nas 'gro na/ rdzu 'phrul gyis sprul pa rnams la 'di lta
480b4(mdo sde): ste| bya'i rgyab tu zhon pa rnams ni/ rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi bya rnams la mngon par zhon nas dga' bar byed pa dang / glu'ang len par byed pa dang /
480b5(mdo sde): lhan cig spyod pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas rab kyi mchog tu rangs pa'i yid kyis rnga skad yan lag lnga dang ldan pa nyan par byed cing / bag med pas
480b6(mdo sde): nye bar 'tsho ba rnams mu su lun+d+ha'i kha nas kun tu 'gro'o/ /lha ngo mtshar bar gyur pa mtshungs pa med pa'i gzugs gsal zhing sdug pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa
480b7(mdo sde): gzhan yang rnam pa gzhan gyis lha rnams sprul par byed pa na/ ji ltar mu su lun+d+ha'i kha nas de dag nyid 'gro ba ni/ ut+pala'i ze ba'i nang du zhon zhing rgyan rgyun par
481a1(mdo sde): ' brel ba'i dbus su song nas lha rdzas kyi rnga skad yan lag lnga pa nyan par byed cing lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyis yongs su bskor
481a2(mdo sde): nas lha rdzas kyi btung ba dag 'thung bar byed do/ /glu yang len par byed la lhan cig spyod pa'i 'khor rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas lan brgya phrag
481a3(mdo sde): dang / ci ste lan stong phrag dang / lan bye ba phrag rnams su'ang gzugs dang kha dog dang dbyibs dpe med pa'i lha'i bu mo mchog rnams kyis yongs
481a4(mdo sde): su bskor nas dga' bar byed pa lha rdzas kyi nags dang nye ba'i nags su thabs du mar rab tu sgrub par byed do/ /nam mkha'i dkyil du mngon par 'phags
481a5(mdo sde): nas sa gzhi dag bzhin du 'gro bar byed la/ rang bzhin pa'i lha de dag kyang glu de dag rnams nyan par byed do/ /de dag gi drung na yon tan brgyas lhag
481a6(mdo sde): par snyan par gyur pa/ de dag gi glu dang de dag gi gzugs dang de dag gi bde ba'ang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa yin no/ /de nas rang bzhin
481a7(mdo sde): du gnas pa'i lha de dag snga na ma mthong ba'i ngo mtshar che ba de dag rnams kun tu mngon par mthong nas/ kha cig ni/ ngo mtshar pa'i mchog dang ldan par gyur to//
481b1(mdo sde): kha cig ni/ rab tu dga' bar gyur las/ kha cig ni/ rmad du byung bar gyur nas ci'i phyir lha de dag rnams ji ltar na 'thab bral gyi bdag po mu su lun+d+ha'i kha nas
481b2(mdo sde): 'gro bar 'gyur/ 'di dag ni/ shin tu'ang ya mtshan che'o/ /de ltar rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams sems par byed pa dang / phan tshun rjod par yang byed de/

481b4(mdo sde): de dag las sna tshogs pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa ral pa ring po dang cod pan dang ldan pa/ shing shun gyi gos can/ lag na ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa/ lha rdzas kyi phreng

481b7(mdo sde): rjod par byed pa/ ji ltar/ sgyu ma lta bu'i srid pa las/ /g.yo ba'i sems can 'di dag kyang / /thams cad 'chi ba'i mtha' can gyi/ /dngos pos bag med par ma byed/ /
482a1(mdo sde): srid pa kun nas 'phel ba yi/ /dga' bar 'gyur ba thams cad la/ /tha mar smad pa'i gnas kyi ni/ /dngos pos bag med par ma

482a4(mdo sde): dga' ba'i 'dod chags gdul dka' ba/ /dmyal bar myur du 'bab 'gyur ba'i/ /dngos pos bag med par ma byed/ /bde ba 'di ni yang dang yang / /yongs
482a5(mdo sde): su nyams pa kun tu 'byung / /yang ni thams cad 'jig 'gyur ba'i/ /srid pas bag med par ma byed/ /'og tu bar gyi bskal bar ni/ /skye rgu skyon gyis nye
482a6(mdo sde): bar bcom/ /las kyi lcags sgrog gis bcings nas/ /ji ltar mchil bas nya bzhin du/ /thabs kyi rnam pa tha dad kyis/ /lcags sgrog gcod par nus mod
482a7(mdo sde): kyi| |lha dang lha min thams cad kyis/ /las kyi sgrog ni gcod mi nus/ /mthong ba med dang shin tu ring / /skyes pa rgya che ba yi sgrog /srid pa'i rgyud ni dam po 'di/ /
482b1(mdo sde): gang yang 'ching ba byis pa rnams/ /bdag cag lha rnams thams cad dang / /mi dang de bzhin lha min med/ /mi rtag nyid las rnam grol min/ /mig med pas kyang mthong
482b2(mdo sde): ba min| |las rgya chen po'i rgyun rnams ni/ /shin tu ring bar rab tu 'jug /ji srid shes pas rnam ma bcom/ /de srid du ni sred pa yin/ /lnga yi gtsub shing las gyur
482b3(mdo sde): pa'i| |sred pa'i bud shing las byung ba/ /rnam rtog rlung ni stobs po ches/ /dus kyi mes ni shin tu sreg /byis pa blo gros chung rtag tu/ /sdug bsngal des kyang kun tu
482b4(mdo sde): ldan| |phyin ci log gis yongs 'khrul bas/ /de ni 'gro ba lngar 'khor ro/ /longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /chung ma bu la kun tu chags/ /mi lus nad kyis

482b6(mdo sde): kyis| |dang ba min pas mi rnams 'joms/ /mnyam pa med dang khyad 'phags pa'i/ /sdug bsngal srid dang srid par mthong / /gti mug gis ni yongs bslus pas/ /
482b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di ni skyo ba'ang med/ /shin tu bdag la byams pa gang / /de kun sdig la brten pa'i mi/ /gang dag bdag la byams min pa/ /de la 'jig rten su mi byams/ /
483a1(mdo sde): de ltar lha de dag gi bag med pa kun nas zhi bar bya ba'i don du mu su lun+d+ha'i kha nas 'byung bzhin pa'i drang srong rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis
483a2(mdo sde): sbrul pas rang bzhin gyi lha rnams la ston par byed de/ de dag ni/ mthar thug par phan pa rnams yin no/ /gzhan yang 'thab bral ba'i mnga' bdag des phan
483a3(mdo sde): pa gzhan gyi sprul pa gzhan rnams byed pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ brang du ches mchog tu dga' bar gyur pa'i ngang ba dang ka raN+Da pa dang ngang ngur dag gis nye bar mdzes par
483a4(mdo sde): gyur pa yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa rab tu dang ba mchog gi chu dang yang dag par ldan pa'i pad+ma'i rdzing bu sprul par byed do/ /de'i pad+ma'i rdzing bu de na brgya stong bye ba'i
483a5(mdo sde): pad+ma rnams legs par skyes pa 'di dag rnams ni/ mtsho chen por gyur pa rnams yin te/ rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin du gyur pa dang / dpag tshad brgyar dri zhim
483a6(mdo sde): po rnams 'byung ba yin no/ /pad+ma de dag rnams kyi nang du song ba'i snying po rnams la cod ban dang ldan pa'i mgo bo rnams rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams kyi
483a7(mdo sde): 'od kyis rab tu snang bar byas pa/ rin po che rab kyi mchog gis rgyan du byas pa'i dbung rgyan can rnams 'dug pa la rnam pa du mar sna tshogs par rab kyi mchog tu lang tsho
483b1(mdo sde): la bab par mang po rnams kyi nye bar glu len par byed cing / seng+ge'i khri la nye bar gnas pa la rnga yab dkar po nye bar g.yob bar byed pa dang / mgo bo la me tog gi
483b2(mdo sde): mchog rnams dang ldan pa'i rjes su spyod pa gzhan rnams kyis mngon par bstod par byed par gyur pas rgyal bar gyur cig / rgyal bar gyur cig ces kun nas dga' ba
483b3(mdo sde): 'phel bar byed pa rnams kyis mngon par bstod par gyur pa na/ brgya byin la rab tu 'gran par byed pa'i rgyal po brgya stong sprul bar byed do/ /gzhan la phan pa la rab
483b4(mdo sde): t u zhugs par gyur pa'i 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag des rang bzhin pa'i lha rnams la go bar bya ba'i don du 'khor los bsgyur ba brgya phrag la 'gran par byed pa'i rgyal
483b5(mdo sde): po brgya phrag stong yang yongs su sprul par byed do/ /gzhan yang gzhan la phan pa rnams la zhugs pas rdzu 'phrul gzhan byed pa ni/ mu su lun+d+ha des rang gi lus rnams
483b6(mdo sde): la sprul par byed pa rnams la dpag tshad brgya pa'i pad+ma de dag rnams ni/ brgya stong bya ba'i 'dab ma dang ldan pa/ rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi rnam par bkra ba'i 'dab
483b7(mdo sde): ma rnams la lha'i bung ba rnams glu nye bar len par gyur pa'i sgra rnams kun tu brjod pa/ dga' bar gyur cing mnyan par 'os pa/ mthong na ches dga' bar gyur pa lha
484a1(mdo sde): rnams kyi pad+ma chen po de'i sgra dag ni/ dpag tshad lnga brgyar 'gro ba yin no/ /yu ba rnams sprul par byed pa ni/ bai DUR+ya'i rang bzhin rdo
484a2(mdo sde): rjes legs par gnas pa/ in+d+ra nI la'i rin po che dang ldan pa mdzes pas 'ja' tshon rnams pas kyang ches lhag par dga' ba yin no/ /pad+ma chen po de'i nang du
484a3(mdo sde): zhugs pa na mi'i rgyan dang cha byad sna tshogs pas rnam pa du mar brgyan pa'i lus mchog tu skyid pa rnams thong gshol gyis zhing las kyang byed cing / zhing gi nang la
484a4(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs brjod pa/ ji ltar/ 'bras 'dod mi rnams thams cad kyis/ /sa gzhi 'di la zhing las byed/ /'dod la chags pa'i mkhas min rnams//
484a5(mdo sde): 'chi ba legs par mthong ba min/ /skad cig skad cig la 'grib pa/ /skye bo 'dod pa'i bsam pas rmongs/ /skad cig skad cig la zad pa'i/ /'du byed go ba
484a6(mdo sde): yang ma yin/ /mi rnams lang tsho mthar byed pa'i/ /rgas pas dbyug pa 'di 'byung ngo / /nad med lo thog 'joms pa yi/ /nad kyi dbyug pa 'di 'byung ngo / /
484a7(mdo sde): 'jigs pa'i dbyug pa 'di gsum gyis/ /lhar bcas lha min 'joms byed pa'i/ /byis pa'i 'jig rten blun po 'dis/ /'ong ba mthong ba yang ma yin/ /lha dang
484b1(mdo sde): lha min dri za dang / /sha za klu dang sren po la'ang / /gson pa mthar ni byed pa'i mchog /dus kyi dbyug pa 'di 'byung 'gyur/ /skye bo gzhan yang rab bcom nas/ /rang gi
484b2(mdo sde): skye la chags shing 'chums/ /srid gzhan 'gro ba'i skye gtong yang / /rmongs pas bcings pa'i skye bo rnams/ /bu dang tsha bo yang tsha dang / /mi gang de yi rigs gnas pa/ /
484b3(mdo sde): de dag thams cad med gyur kyang / /khyod ni chags pas 'ching bar byed/ /de ltar sprul pa de dag gis gzhan la phan pa bsgrub pa'i don du tshigs su bcad pa brjod
484b4(mdo sde): pa yin no/ /rang bzhin gyi lha rnams kyis kyang thos shing thos par gyur nas kyang yid kyis 'thung bar byed do/ /yul rnams la'ang shin tu bag med bar yang mi 'gyur
484b5(mdo sde): r o| |de nas gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul gzhan shin tu dga' ba rnams gzhan la phan pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag des sprul par byed pa rnams
484b6(mdo sde): ni| 'di lta ste/ yan lag dang nying lag rnams thams cad las rgyan dang cha byad sna tshogs pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams ni/ kha cig yin no/ /kha
484b7(mdo sde): cig ni| kha dog du ma rnams dang dbyibs du ma rnams dang 'gro ba du ma rnams dang ldan pa'i lha dang / dri za dang / mi dang / klu dang / lha ma yin dang / gzhan dag rnams kyang ste/ rang gi skye ba
485a1(mdo sde): ba gnyug mar gnas par gyur pa'i rgyan dang cha byad can rnams kun tu 'byung ste/ 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag de'i ba spu'i khung bu rnams thams cad
485a2(mdo sde): las dang / lus kyi mtha' rnams ma lus pa las 'byung ba ni/ ji ltar rjes su mthun ba dang / gnas skabs ji lta ba dang / de dag gi rigs rnams dang / rjes su spyod pa rnams
485a3(mdo sde): ji lta ba'i 'khor gyis glu len par byed pa dang gar byed pa dang rgod par bye dpa yin no/ /mi rnams ni/ mi rnams dang rjes su 'tsham par gyur ba'i longs spyod mchog tu yid 'phrog
485a4(mdo sde): bar byed pa rnams dang yang dag par ldan pas gar byed pa dang rgod par byed pas kyang mi rnams kyis rgyal po bde ba rnams la nye bar longs spyod par byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin
485a5(mdo sde): du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang / cha byad can gyi klu rnams kyang kha cig ni/ mgo gcig pa/ kha cig ni/ mgo gnyis pa/ kha cig ni/ mgo gsum pa/ kha cig ni/ mgo
485a6(mdo sde): bzhi pa| kha cig ni/ mgo lnga pa/ kha cig ni/ mgo drug pa/ kha cig ni/ mgo bdun pa rnams yin te/ mdog dang dbyibs sna tshogs pa'i cod pan bcings pa'i mgo bo
485a7(mdo sde): rnams yin no/ /rin po che sna tshogs pa'i 'od zer gyis mchog tu gsal bar byas pa'i mgo bo can rnams sna tshogs pa'i rol mo'i sgra dang glu dang rgod pa dang 'gying ba dang rtse dga'
485b1(mdo sde): bas rjes su chags pa'i yid kyis bde ba rnams la nye bar longs spyod par byed do/ /de bzhin du lha ma yin yang brtan pa la sogs pa sgra gcan 'dzin gyi mthar thug pas gzhir
485b2(mdo sde): gtogs pa rnams sprul par byed do/ /'thab bral gyi bdag po des bskal pa gzhan gyi brgya byin rtsa lag lhan cig rjes su spyod pa rnams kyis rjes su 'brang bar gyur pa/ mchog
485b3(mdo sde): t u gzugs dang rgyan dang cha byad dang rab tu dang ba'i lha ma yin gyi bu mos rjes su 'brang bar gyur bas rnga skad yan lag lnga pa rnams thos nas dga' bar 'gyur bas yid ches
485b4(mdo sde): su 'brel pas mchog tu skyid pa rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi mnga' bdag rnams kyang khang bu na legs par gnas nas mu su lun+d+ha'i lus dang kha nas kun tu 'byung ste/ sprul
485b5(mdo sde): pa rnams thams cad kyang rtse bar byed bzhin pas mchog tu'ang dpe med pa'i bde ba rnams la nye bar longs spyod par byed do/ /de bzhin du byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams kyang
485b6(mdo sde): sprul par byed de/ sprin dang 'bres pa la sogs pa'i rin po che bcu la so sor gnas pa rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams las nye bar longs spyod par bya ba rnams cung zad
485b7(mdo sde): kyis chung bar gyur pa'i nags dang nye ba'i nags dang rdzing bu dang pad+ma'i tshal rnams dang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba'i klung dang btung ba rnams dang / rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bde ba rnam pa
486a1(mdo sde): du ma rnams nyams su myong bar gyur bas rtse bar byed pa dang gar byed pa rnams kyang mu su lun+d+ha'i las po nyid las kun tu 'byung ngo / /
486a2(mdo sde): de bzhin du ba lang spyod pa rnams kyi mi rnams dang rang gi bde ba dag dang yang dag par ldan par gyur bas mchog gi rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis gar byed par gyur
486a3(mdo sde): pa dang / glu len par gyur pa dang / rgod par gyur pas mu su lun+d+ha'i lus nyid las kun tu 'byung ngo / /de bzhin du shar phyogs lus 'phags pa'i mi rnams kyi
486a4(mdo sde): rang gi bde ba dang yang dag par ldan pa dang / rab kyi mchog tu rangs pa'i yid kyis rtse bar gyur pa rnams kyang rang bzhin gyi lha rnams kyis mthong ngo / /cho 'phrul gyi
486a5(mdo sde): mchog rnams dang yang dag par ldan bar gyur pa'i 'thab bral ba rnams kyi bdag po des de ltar rnam pa du ma dang / rnam par rtog pa du mas bag med pa rnams kun
486a6(mdo sde): nas zhi bar bya ba'i don dang / gzhan rnams la phan par bya ba'i don du'ang sprul pa de dag rnams byed do/ /bag med pas rnam par rgyu bar byed pa'i lha de dag rnams
486a7(mdo sde): ji ltar na mi rtag pa mngon sum du gyur pas sems kyi rgyu 'jam por 'gyur ba yin zhes rgyu 'di'i phyir na phun sum tshogs pa rnams ston par byed de/ 'dod pa rnams kyi kun
486b1(mdo sde): nas ro myang ba'i don dang / phyi nas ni/ nyes dmigs rnams bstan par bya'o/ /rnam pa ji srid kyis 'dod pa rnams las nges par 'byung ba yin pa'i rgyu 'di dag gis lha rnams
486b2(mdo sde): sprul pa byas so/ /de la kun nas ro myang bar gyur pa rnams ni/ ji ltar thos par gyur pa bzhin du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod pa rnams kyi gang dang / rgod

486b4(mdo sde): yongs su bsnyen bkur ba dang 'khyud 'phyang byed ba rnams te/ dbang po lnga ga'i nye bar longs spyod pa rnams thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du mngon par chags pa phun
486b5(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa 'di ni/ 'dod pa rnams kyi ro myong ba zhes brjod do/ /de la nyes dmigs rnams gang dag zhe na/ thob par gyur ba'i 'dod pa gang dag yin pa rnams
486b6(mdo sde): mngon par 'chums pa sngon du 'gro bas don du gnyer bar byed pa na nyams par 'gyur ba dang / thun mong ba rnams kyis dbang byas nas brlag par gyur pa'i bral bas bskyed
486b7(mdo sde): pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma rnams dang / gzhan dag gis 'phrog par gyur pa'am/ rdzas dang ldan pa las 'jig pa lngas nges par 'joms pa rnams kyang 'di lta ste/ rgyal po
487a1(mdo sde): dang chu dang chom rkun pa dang me la sogs pa rnams so/ /sdug bsngal gzhan dag rnams kyis kyang gzhi bor 'gyur ba yin no/ /rtag tu'ang
487a2(mdo sde): dgra rnams kyis mngon par 'tshe bar 'gyur ba dang / brlag gis dogs pa srung ba'i 'jigs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa rnams kyis 'jigs par yang 'gyur ro/ /

487a7(mdo sde): dag la spun dang spun rnams lhan cig tu 'thab rtsod byed do/ /gsod pa dang 'ching ba rnams kyang phul du phyin par byed do/ /de dag kyang 'dod pa'i rgyu las yin/ /
487b1(mdo sde): la| 'dod pa rnams kyi don gyis de bzhin du rgyal po dang rgyal po'ang lhan cig tu 'thab cing rtsod bar byed do/ /g.yul 'gyed par byed do/ /yul ljong rnams 'joms

487b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi don du yin pas na/ 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs 'di dag rnams kyang so sor shes par bya'o/ /gang gi phyir 'khor ba rnams thams cad kyi 'ching
487b4(mdo sde): ba yin pa'i 'dod pa 'di dag rnams bye brag tu rtogs par bya ba yin no/ /de la rgyu 'di dag gis ni/ 'thab bral ba rnams kyi bdag po des lha de dag rnams la rnam

491a4(mdo sde): rnams kyis de bzhin du 'chi bdag gi pho nya nye bar rgyug par byed pa rnams ni/ nye 'khor rnams na bya rgod dang khwa ta dang kang+ka dang lce sbyang dang rnga mo'i gdong can rnams
491a5(mdo sde): lus la khrag gis rnam bar byugs pa dang / grog ma 'phungs pa'i lus can gyi lha de dag rnams mngon par mi dga' ba rnams nges par yod par byed pa yin
491a6(mdo sde): n o| |dus kyi ri chen po de dag las sprul pa byas pa de dag rnams thams cad kyang gang na lha sprul pa'i lha de rnams yod bar der rlung gi shugs chen pos btab pa bzhin
491a7(mdo sde): du sprin nag po glog dang bcas pas myur bar rgyug par byed do/ /de nas 'chi bdag lta bur byed bar gyur pa de dag rnams kyis lha de dag rnams dang nye bar 'ongs par gyur
491b1(mdo sde): nas sprul pa'i lha de dag rnams mngon par 'dzin par byed do/ /de'i gting la kha cig ni/ rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa'i lcags kyi thag pa rnams kyis dpung pa bcings nas
491b2(mdo sde): 'dren par byed do/ /de bzhin du sprul pa'i lha gzhan de dag rnams nyid 'khrid par gyur pa mngon par mthong nas shin tu 'jigs par gyur pas phan tshun kun tu rgyug par byed
491b3(mdo sde): do| |de dag rnams kyang 'dzin par byed de/ 'chi bdag gi pho nya ni/ mgo la mngon par dmigs nas de dag nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te 'jigs par byed pa'i nga ro
491b4(mdo sde): dag kun tu bton pas mig gi yul nges par mchong bar byed do/ /kha cig ni/ lha gzhan ma de dag rnams nyid bzung nas lcags kyi rang bzhin gyi rab tu bar ba'i thag pa
491b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis mgrin pa bcings shing khyer te sa gzhi'i gseb tu rjes su thim nas mi mthong bar 'gro bar byed do/ /'chi bdag gi pho nya sprul pa byas pa gzhan de dag rnams
491b6(mdo sde): kha cig gis kyang sprul pa'i lha rnams khyer nas chur bying bar byed de/ rab tu phros par gyur pas nang du nub par gyur to/ /de ltar rnam pa du ma dang rnam par rtog pa du ma rnams
491b7(mdo sde): su sprul pa de dag rnams ni/ 'jigs pa chen por gyur pa rnams yin no/ /rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams kyis kyang de dag rnams thams cad rmi lam gyi snang ba bzhin du mthong bar
492a1(mdo sde): gyur te/ 'di dang 'di dag rnams ni/ ci yin zhes go bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /de nas de dag gang gi tshe sprul par gyur pa'i lha rnams la
492a2(mdo sde): dmigs pa na de'i tshe sprul pa'i skyes bu de dag rnams kyis rjes su gdams par byed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa rnams ni/ ji ltar/ longs spyod rgyags pas
492a3(mdo sde): rgyags pa yi/ /bag med dbang gis 'jug pa rnams/ /rmongs pa rnams kyi dus song nas/ /'chi bdag dus su 'ongs pa yin/ /nags kyi dus 'di mtha' yas
492a4(mdo sde): pa| |dug gis gang ba ji bzhin nags/ /sred pa'i myu gu rnam spangs pa/ /dge ba don gnyer kun nas spangs/ /mdzes pa'i las ni ma byas par/ /bag med pas
492a5(mdo sde): kyang bag med 'gyur/ /'chi bdag 'jigs pa'i dus byung na/ /blo gros ngan pa ci byar byod/ /sred pa'i chur ni nub pa gang / /sdug bsngal pha rol tu phyin min/ /rga dang
492a6(mdo sde): 'chi bar bying ba gang / /bde ba de dag rnams la med/ /skyes pa tsam gyis thams cad kyi/ /rgyab na 'chi bdag nges par gnas/ /ci yi don du 'jig rten 'di/ /bag med
492a7(mdo sde): pas ni bag med byed/ /nyams pa med dang rnam mi shes/ /rtag tu glags gcod stobs pa che/ /'chi bdag dmag dpung shugs po che/ /'jig rten pas kyang go ba min/ /
492b1(mdo sde): rtag tu rnam par 'gal 'gyur dang / /zlog thabs med pa nyid kyang yin/ /sems can thams cad 'chi ba yang / /bag med pas ni ma go'o/ /'chi bdag gir gyur 'jig rten
492b2(mdo sde): gsum| |nye 'khor kun tu rnam par dpyod/ /rga dang na dang rgud pa yang / /byas pa rnams kyis rig pa min/ /de ltar sprul pa 'chi bdag gi pho nyar gyur pa de dag gis sprul
492b3(mdo sde): pa'i lha de dag rnams la rjes su gdams par byed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams brjod nas lan brgya phrag rnams su dang / lan stong phrag rnams su'ang srid pa rnams
492b4(mdo sde): su khrid par byed cing de bzhin du 'dren par byed do/ /sdug bsngal chen po de dag rnams mthong bar gyur pas kyang rang bzhin gyi lha de dag gis bag med ba las shin
492b5(mdo sde): tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba spangs nas yid 'byung bar 'gyur zhing thams cad kyang rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song bar gyur to/ /de
492b6(mdo sde): d ag rtogs nas gzhan yang 'thab bral gyi bdag po des lha de dag rnams kyi yid gzhan yang ji lta ba bzhin du las su rung ba bya ba'i phyir slar nyid kyang sprul pa gzhan
492b7(mdo sde): rnams sprul par byed pa ni/ lha de dag rnams nyid kyi phyir zhing nyid kyang khyad par du rtogs nas dga' bar 'gyur ba rnams la 'di lta ste/ dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'dod pa
493a1(mdo sde): rnams thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyal po gang yin pa de dag rnams mu su lun+d+ha'i lus las nges par 'byung ste/ lhan cig
493a2(mdo sde): spyod par byed pa'i mchog tu lang tsho la bab pa rnams kyis phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur pa rnams ni/ sngar kho na bzhin no/ /de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa de srid kyi
493a3(mdo sde): gzugs dang phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyis kyang phun sum tshogs par gyur nas phyi nas yang rgyal po rnams lus gog por song ba/ mgo bo kun skra dkar rnams
493a4(mdo sde): kyis g.yogs par gyur pa/ lus po rnams kun nas 'khums pa/ lus la gnyer ma dang skra dkar rnams kyis kun tu gang ba/ lus dbyug pa la kun nas
493a5(mdo sde): brten pa/ mchog tu rjud par gyur pa'i lus po can rnams las rnam pa thams cad la nus pa med par gyur pa/ gzhan la kun nas brten nas 'gro bar byed
493a6(mdo sde): pa| skye bo rnams thams cad bzhad gang du gyur pa/ sgra ngar ngar por gyur pa'i dbugs phyir 'byung ba/ lus kun la bsnye bas nyams par byas pa/ dbang
493a7(mdo sde): po rnams shin tu rnying par gyur pa thams cad la'ang spro ba med pa/ skye po rnams thams cad skyug zlog par byed pa/ 'khyor zhing 'gro bar gyur pa/ dus shin tu nye
493b1(mdo sde): bar gyur pa de dag rnams mtsho 'di nyid na rgyu bar byed de/ stobs shin tu'ang chung bar gyur pa gzhan dag gi lag pa la 'phyangs nas gom ba rnams 'bor bar byed pa shin
493b2(mdo sde): tu'ang 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa rnams yin no/ /de dang de ltar rgyu bar byed pa rnams kyis lus rnams la dus gzhan 'ga' zhig gi tshe na gzugs mang po
493b3(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i nad rnams kun tu skye ba ni/ rims tsha ba dang / ha cang thal ches par 'khru ba dang / glo lu ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / skyigs bu dang / skrang gro
493b4(mdo sde): dang / mdze sngon du 'gro bar gyur pa rnams kyi shin tu mi bzad par gyur pa/ nye bar 'tshe ba rnams dang bcas pa 'chi ba'i mthar thug par byed pa/ shin tu skyug bro bar gyur pa'i
493b5(mdo sde): n ad khyad par du drag po de dag rnams kun tu 'byung bar gyur pa'i stobs kyis gso dpyad med pa dang mi 'dod pa rnams mthar thug par byas pas rgyal po de dag rnams
493b6(mdo sde): thams cad nyid khrid par gyur nas shin tu sdug bsngal ba kho nar 'chi bar byed do/ /shi ba de dag rnams kyi lus de dag rnams zags shing dri mi zhim par gyur pa la srin bu
493b7(mdo sde): brgya stong gis khyab par gyur pas za bar byed bzhin pa'i lus de dag rnams rang bzhin pa'i lha de dag rnams kyis mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas gang dag gis de dag gi lus
494a1(mdo sde): rnams 'dzin par byed pa'i sprul pa'i bya rnams kyang kun tu 'ongs par gyur nas kha cig gis ni/ za bar byed do/ /kha cig gis ni/ bzung
494a2(mdo sde): bar gyur pa mthong nas 'bros par byed de/ de dag rnams kyang mchog tu skyo ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i gnas su legs par mthong bas lha rang bzhin pa de dag rnams
494a3(mdo sde): shin tu legs par mnyam par bzhag pa'i yid du 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang lha de dag rnams nyid la phan par bya ba'i don du 'thab bral gyi bdag po brtan pas mgo
494a4(mdo sde): d rangs pa'i lha ma yin gyi rgyal bo gang yin pa de dag rnams sgra gcan 'dzin gyi mthar thug par gyur pa'i sa 'og na gnas pa de dag rnams gang gi tshe mu su lun+d+ha
494a5(mdo sde): l as mi ring ba na kun nas gnas par gyur la de'i tshe rnam par khros par gyur pas kyang thams cad kyi skad chen po kun tu gtong zhing phan tshun du'ang bos par gyur
494a6(mdo sde): nas sa gzhi la kun nas 'gyel ba ni/ sta res shing ka rtsi kA ra rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du sa gzhi la 'gyel bar gyur to/ /'gyel nas kyang shi bar gyur pas
494a7(mdo sde): thams cad shing dang rdo ba rnams bzhin du rnam par 'gyur ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag rnams mngon par mthong nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo de dag rnams
494b1(mdo sde): shin tu sdug bsngal gyis gzir nas kyang rnam par khro bar byed pa dang / du bar yang byed do/ /yongs su bskor bar gyur nas de dag rnams thams cad kyang de ltar ngu bar
494b2(mdo sde): b yed pa rnams la bya dag kun tu 'ongs par gyur nas de dag gis de dag rnams kyi lus shing skam dang rdo ba dang shing bu dang mtshungs par byed pa med pa rnams kun nas 'dren
494b3(mdo sde): par byed do/ /snying rje rnam par 'khrugs par gyur pa'i lha ma yin gyi bu mo de dag rnams de nas de ltar rnam par 'khrugs pa'i gting thogs nyid la de dag rnams
494b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyang shi par gyur to/ /de dag rnams kyi ro de dag rnams kyang bya rnams nyid kyis 'dzin par byed do/ /bzung bar gyur nas kyang khwa ta dang 'ug pa dang bya rgod
494b5(mdo sde): rnams nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba'i yul las 'das nas 'gro bar byed do/ /de ltar yang 'thab bral ba rnams kyi bdag po des rang bzhin
494b6(mdo sde): gyi lha rnams la phan par bya ba'i don du sprul pa gzhan rnams kyang phul du phyin par byas so/ /de'i rjes thogs la sprul pa gzhan dag byed pa rnams la ji ltar gang de
494b7(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po rnams gang yin pa de dag gi sprul pa rnams ni/ snga ma bzhin no/ /yang de dag rnams kyi mi rtag pa 'di dag ston par byed pa las de ltar yang klu rnams
495a1(mdo sde): kha cig ni/ bye tshan dag gis sreg par byed do/ /sol ba'i me tsha ba rnams kun tu 'bab par 'gyur zhing de dag rnams bab par gyur pas
495a2(mdo sde): kyang de ltar sreg par byed do/ /ji ltar seng ldeng gi me shin tu chen po rnams su rtswa 'jag skam po gcig lhung ba sreg par byed pa de bzhin du lhung bar gyur pa tsam nyid
495a3(mdo sde): na klu de dag rnams bye tshan gyis sreg par byed do/ /de dag rnams las gzhan pa'i klu rnams kyang 'chi bdag gis 'khrid par 'gyur te/ lhan cig spyod par byed pa
495a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi nang na gnas pa las rnam par khros par gyur bzhin du de dag rnams dus kyi 'khor los sdud par byed do/ /gzhan rnams kha cig ni/ phan tshun du 'gyed
495a5(mdo sde): par gyur pas phan tshun du bcings nas snying phan tshun du 'joms par byed do/ /de ltar 'chi bdag rnams kyis kun tu khrid par gyur pa'i sprul pa'i klu de dag rnams
495a6(mdo sde): kyang rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams kyis mthong bar gyur to/ /mthong nas kyang phyir zhing kho na shin tu nges par yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang 'thab bral ba
495a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi bdag po de nyid kyis sprul pa gzhan dag byed pa ni/ ji ltar shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / ba lang spyod pa rnams kyi mi rnams kyang rgas pa rnam pa
495b1(mdo sde): sna tshogs pa rnams kyis zil gyis gnon par byed do/ /lhan cig rjes su spyod pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la na brgya dang stong du'ang byed do/ /shi ba de dag rnams nyid
495b2(mdo sde): k yi lus de dag rnams la srin bu rnams kyis gang bar gyur par shin tu 'jigs su rung bar sa gzhi la 'gyel bar gyur pa dag rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams kyis mtho
495b3(mdo sde): par gyur to/ /rnam pa du ma dang rnam par rtog pa du mar yang srid pa'i skyon phul du phyin pa'i sdug bsngal gyis 'chi ba mngon par mthong nas rang bzhin gyi lha de dag
495b4(mdo sde): mchog tu yid byung ba dang ldan par gyur nas 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'di ni/ nges par bslang ba yin te/ de ltar yang srog chags su gyur pa gang yin pa 'di dag
495b5(mdo sde): rnams thams cad kyang rga ba dang nad dang 'chi ba rnams kyis mthar thug par byed pa yin pa rab tu mi shes na/ de dag rnams kyang gang du song gang gis khrid par gyur
495b6(mdo sde): pa yin| phun sum tshogs pa rnams thams cad ni/ mi rtag pa yin pa dang / bde ba rnams thams cad kyang srid pa'i skyon dang kun tu 'dres pa'i 'dus byas zhes
495b7(mdo sde): bya ba g.yo ba/ mthar 'jig par 'gyur ba 'di la blo dang ldan pa'i skyes bu rnams kyis yid ches par mi bya'o/ /rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba'i chos can 'di dag
496a1(mdo sde): rnams thams cad la 'di dang / srid pa gzhan du'ang bde ba yod pa ma yin no/ /mchog tu skyo ba skyes pa'i yid dang ldan pa'i legs
496a2(mdo sde): par skyo ba skyes pa'i blo dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams de ltar phan tshun du rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'thab bral gyi bdag po des de dag rnams kyi

496a4(mdo sde): pa| nges par gong du 'gro ba de dag rnams ni/ 'di lta ste/ gang byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa gang yin pa rnams te/ de dag rnams ni/ lha rnams kyi drung na cung zad
496a5(mdo sde): pa zhig gis chung ba'i mchog tu skyid par gyur pa'o/ /de dag rnams kyang rgas pa dang nad kyis gzir ba'i bar gyur nas 'chi bdag gi zhags pas 'dren par byed
496a6(mdo sde): do| |shin tu 'jigs su rung ba'i lus rnams la srin bu brgya stong gis kun nas g.yogs par gyur pa/ lus po 'di dag la skye bo rnams thams cad kyis blta
496a7(mdo sde): bar rjes su mi mthun pa/ bshang ba'i phung po rnams kyis kun tu gang bar gyur pa'i byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa 'di dag rnams so/ /de ltar bde ba rgya chen po'i sa
496b1(mdo sde): na gnas pa'i 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams la phan par bya ba'i don du lha dang mi dang lha ma yin rnams kyi mi rtag pa nyid 'thab bral gyi bdag po 'dis bstan pa yin no/ /de'i
496b2(mdo sde): rjes thogs la gang dag rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams kyis mthong bar sprul pa gzhan dag rnams byed pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ srid pa bar mdo ba'i tshogs rnam pa du ma rnams so/ /
496b3(mdo sde): ji ltar shi bar gyur nas sems can rnams las sna tshogs pa rnams kyi dbang gis dmyal ba dang yi dwags dang dud 'gro dang lha dang mi rnams su skye ba de bzhin du srid pa bar mdo
496b4(mdo sde): pa rnams sprul ba byed de/ ji ltar 'gro ba lnga po rnams kun tu rgyu bar byed pa rnams lhar nga bzhin pas mngon sum nyid du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de la las du ma rnams las
496b5(mdo sde): sems kyi tha ma'i bsam pa'i dbang gis skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de las rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams nyid nges par skyo bar bya ba'i don du rnam pa du mar lan brgya stong du skye rgu rnams
496b6(mdo sde): 'gro bar lngar skye ba sprul par byed do/ /mtsho de nyid du bsam gyis mi khyab pa shin tu ngo mtshar ba gzhan rnams dang mi 'dra ba de dag rnams mngon par mthong zhing rang bzhin gyi lha
496b7(mdo sde): de dag gis mngon sum kho nar mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de la'ang 'gro ba lngar kun tu rgyu bar byed pa'i 'byung po rnams thams cad las dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyi dbang gis
497a1(mdo sde): ' grangs par gyur pas 'gro ba gzhan nas 'gro ba gzhan rnams su dmyal ba dang yi dwags dang dud 'gro dang lha dang mi'i 'gro ba rnams la

497a3(mdo sde): dang lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du brje bsor byed pa rnams mthong ngo / /de la srid pa bar ma do ba rnams kyi ya mtshan che bar gyur pa/ shin tu 'jigs su rung ba/ kun

497a5(mdo sde): mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de la lha rnams nyid kyi de lta bu'i srid pa bar mdo ba mthong ba las/ 'thab bral ba'i lha'i rigs rnams las las zad par gyur nas rab
497a6(mdo sde): tu lhung bar gyur pa na 'gyod pa'i mes sreg par byed pa bag med pa rnams kyis de ltar shin tu bslus nas mgo bo thur la dpyangs pas rab tu lhung bar 'gyur ro/ /de
497a7(mdo sde): dag 'chi 'pho bar gyur pa na lha gang yin pa'i rgyud des yongs su bzung ba'i phung po de dag rnams ni/ nye bar nub par 'gyur ro/ /rgya'i rjes dang cha 'dra bar srid pa bar
497b1(mdo sde): ma do ba de'i 'gro ba rnams kyi phung po rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dmyal ba rnams kyi las byas bar gyur pa de dang / 'khor bas byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa kun
